definition: a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye

sentences.english: However, just after the split second, fillip's the smiling face on his face is stiff to become diamond dust.

definition: past events/relics from a former age/ruins
windblown dust/hardships of travel/vicissitudes of life/prostitution
in the twinkling of an eye/in a flash/to turn one's eyes
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
strand/thread/detailed/in detail/classifier for wisps (of smoke, mist or vapor), strands, locks (of hair)
